mapper.select: select r.data_key dataKey,r.data_key_name dataKeyName,r.data_mark dataMark,r.data_value dataValue, r.device_id deviceId,r.equipment_no equipmentNo,r.event_time eventTime, r.gateway_name gatewayName,r.id,r.sensor_name sensorName,r.service_id serviceId,r.service_type serviceType,r.user_id userId,r.user_name userName from real_time_data r where r.data_key=#{dataKey} and r.device_id=#{deviceId} order by r.device_id,r.data_key
